name: Animal Robbing
description:
The WebGL Build may be bugged, consider download the game if you meet any problem.

In Animal Robbing, you are a goat who installed a fruits stand in a festival. Everything was going well until a thief started to seal your goods every night!

You are to stop him or her at any cost!

Put traps in your shop to keep the thief away from your merchandise and use captors to gather clues.

With them you could find out who is the robber and call the police so they can arrest him or her!

But be careful, you must maintain your shop and not run out of money!

Good luck!

Animal Robbing is a game made by Solah and Solweak with the voice acting participation of Cess for the olc::BeatTheBoredom jam in April 2020 with the theme "Outdoors".
